location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 50 to Rawson Hart Boddam, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter congratulates Boddam on his appointment as President (following Hornby's return to Europe). A consignment of woollens and related trade matters are discussed in detail. The movements (and cargoes) of the NeptunePacket, the Panther, the Europaand a Danish vessel are described. The letter notes an error (of 100 rupees) in the manifest of pearls and treasure freight by the BombayGrab and discusses other financial matters in detail.
